🎯

4) Money flows from BTC -> Alts = altseason 
5) BTC+ETH dominance chart makes a lower low

articles.description:
With Privacy as an emerging primitive  keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024

Crypto, Distilled: $ETH killers were the sweetest fruit of 2021.
2024’s golden goose could be very different.
Emerging Primitives:
- Autonomous Economic Agents (AEAs)
- AiDeFi (+ other DeAi verticals)
- DePIN (storage, GPU, etc.)  
- Privacy-Enabled Infrastructure 
- Modular Blockchains + DA
-…
